squats.name: Squats
squats.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and perform a sitting motion, keeping your back straight and knees behind toes.

pushups.name: Push-ups
pushups.description: Starting in a plank position, lower your body to the ground by bending your elbows. Push yourself back up.

deadlifts.name: Deadlifts
deadlifts.description: With feet hip-width apart, bend and grasp a barbell. Lift by extending hips and knees to full extension. Keep your back straight throughout.

bench_press.name: Bench Press
bench_press.description: Lie on a bench with a barbell above you. Lower the bar to your chest, then press it back up.

pullups.name: Pull-ups
pullups.description: Grasp a bar above you with a wide grip. Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.

lunges.name: Lunges
lunges.description: Step forward with one leg and lower your body until your rear knee nearly touches the ground and your front thigh is parallel to the ground.

shoulder_press.name: Shoulder Press
shoulder_press.description: From a seated or standing position, press a pair of dumbbells or a barbell from shoulder height to overhead.

leg_curls.name: Leg Curls
leg_curls.description: Using a leg curl machine, lie face down and curl weights up with your legs.

bicep_curls.name: Bicep Curls
bicep_curls.description: Holding a pair of dumbbells, curl the weights toward your shoulders.

tricep_dips.name: Tricep Dips
tricep_dips.description: Using parallel bars or the edge of a bench, lower yourself down and then push back up to starting position.

leg_press.name: Leg Press
leg_press.description: Using a leg press machine, push the weighted platform away, then return to start.

lat_pulldown.name: Lat Pulldown
lat_pulldown.description: Pull a weighted bar down from above to chest level.

dumbbell_flyes.name: Dumbbell Flyes
dumbbell_flyes.description: Lying on a bench, extend arms out and bring dumbbells together above chest.

dumbbell_rows.name: Dumbbell Rows
dumbbell_rows.description: Bend over and pull dumbbell to hip using one arm.

leg_extensions.name: Leg Extensions
leg_extensions.description: Using a leg extension machine, extend legs to straight position.

situps.name: Sit-ups
situps.description: Lying on back, lift torso toward knees.

planks.name: Planks
planks.description: Hold body in a straight line using arms and toes.

side_lateral_raises.name: Side Lateral Raises
side_lateral_raises.description: Holding dumbbells, raise arms out to the sides.

face_pulls.name: Face Pulls
face_pulls.description: Pull a rope toward face using a cable machine.

overhead_tricep_extension.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
overhead_tricep_extension.description: Hold a dumbbell behind head and extend arms.

calf_raises.name: Calf Raises
calf_raises.description: Lift heels by standing on toes.

reverse_flyes.name: Reverse Flyes
reverse_flyes.description: Holding dumbbells, extend arms out to the sides.

bicycle_crunches.name: Bicycle Crunches
bicycle_crunches.description: Lying on back, alternate elbow to opposite knee.

dumbbell_step_ups.name: Dumbbell Step Ups
dumbbell_step_ups.description: Step up onto a platform holding dumbbells.

barbell_rows.name: Barbell Rows
barbell_rows.description: Bend over and pull barbell to hip.

dumbbell_press.name: Dumbbell Press
dumbbell_press.description: Press dumbbells up while lying on a bench.

skullcrushers.name: Skullcrushers
skullcrushers.description: Lying on bench, lower a barbell to forehead then extend arms.

box_jumps.name: Box Jumps
box_jumps.description: Jump onto a raised platform from a standing position.

russian_twists.name: Russian Twists
russian_twists.description: Sitting on the floor, twist torso side to side holding a weight.

dumbbell_lunges.name: Dumbbell Lunges
dumbbell_lunges.description: Step forward holding dumbbells and lower into a lunge.

t_bar_rows.name: T-Bar Rows
t_bar_rows.description: Using a T-bar machine, pull the weighted bar to your chest.

hammer_curls.name: Hammer Curls
hammer_curls.description: Holding dumbbells with a neutral grip, curl them to your shoulders.

seated_leg_curls.name: Seated Leg Curls
seated_leg_curls.description: On a seated leg curl machine, curl weights down using your legs.

pec_deck_flyes.name: Pec Deck Flyes
pec_deck_flyes.description: Using a pec deck machine, bring padded handles together in front of you.

leg_raises.name: Leg Raises
leg_raises.description: Lying on back, raise legs to vertical position and lower without touching the ground.

farmers_walk.name: Farmer's Walk
farmers_walk.description: Holding heavy weights, walk for a set distance or time.

dumbbell_deadlifts.name: Dumbbell Deadlifts
dumbbell_deadlifts.description: Hold dumbbells in front and with a straight back, bend and lift using your legs and hips.

barbell_shrugs.name: Barbell Shrugs
barbell_shrugs.description: Holding a barbell, shrug your shoulders upwards.

dumbbell_side_bends.name: Dumbbell Side Bends
dumbbell_side_bends.description: Holding a dumbbell in one hand, bend side-to-side.

incline_bench_press.name: Incline Bench Press
incline_bench_press.description: On an inclined bench, press weights from chest level to overhead.

decline_situps.name: Decline Sit-ups
decline_situps.description: On a declined bench, perform sit-ups.

cable_crossover.name: Cable Crossover
cable_crossover.description: Using two cable machines, pull handles in a fly motion in front of you.

goblet_squats.name: Goblet Squats
goblet_squats.description: Hold a single dumbbell or kettlebell in front and perform a squat.

cable_tricep_pushdown.name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
cable_tricep_pushdown.description: Using a cable machine, push the handle down using your triceps.

hyperextensions.name: Hyperextensions
hyperextensions.description: On a hyperextension bench, raise your upper body using your lower back muscles.

ez_bar_curls.name: EZ Bar Curls
ez_bar_curls.description: Using an EZ bar, curl the weight toward your shoulders.

seated_dumbbell_press.name: Seated Dumbbell Press
seated_dumbbell_press.description: While seated, press dumbbells from shoulder height to overhead.
